title: 4.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
In this challenge, you will introduce more instance variables to an existing Bird class. Consider the code below.

You need to introduce two new instance variables: color and food. Create a BirdMain class and create data for three different birds using the constructor of the Bird class.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
